meanings.definition: The state of not being circumcised.
meanings.sent1: His uncircumcision was a topic of discussion among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the benefits of uncircumcision to the parents.
meanings.sent3: The uncircumcision of the cake left it looking different from the others at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her uncircumcision of emotions made it hard for others to understand her.
meanings.sent5: The uncircumcision of the garden revealed a hidden beauty underneath.

meanings.sent1: The uncircumcision of their son was a personal choice for the parents.
meanings.sent2: The uncircumcision of the tradition caused quite a stir in the community.
meanings.sent3: His uncircumcision of responsibilities led to chaos in the workplace.
meanings.sent4: The uncircumcision of the project deadline resulted in delays.
meanings.sent5: She believed in the uncircumcision of rules to encourage creativity.
